title: BRIEF-Velpic Says Damstra Has Completed Its Capital Raising
text:
BRIEF-Velpic Says Damstra Has Completed Its Capital Raising

Stock Markets 46 minutes ago (Sep 30, 2019 20:10)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Velpic Says Damstra Has Completed Its Capital Raising Sept 30 (Reuters) - Velpic Ltd : * DAMSTRA HAS COMPLETED ITS CAPITAL RAISING AND IS IN A POSITION TO COMPLETE ONE-OFF PAYMENT OF DEFERRED CONSIDERATION OF $2.05 MILLION * DAMSTRA HAS REQUESTED, AND COMPANY HAS AGREED, TO EXTEND PAYMENT DATE OUT TO 18 OCTOBER 2019

BRIEF-Velpic Says Damstra Has Completed Its Capital Raising
description: BRIEF-Velpic Says Damstra Has Completed Its Capital Raising
